issues.details: Material is missing: BRICK TYPE A (30582742)
issues.consequence: The system will proceed as usual, skipping the missing material.
issues.suggestedFix: Did you order and verify the delivery of this material? Has it been replaced in the construction plan? Does the building blueprint need updating?

issues.details: Incorrect material supplied: WOOD PLANK C (50893412)
issues.consequence: Construction will halt until the material issue is reviewed and corrected.
issues.suggestedFix: Check the latest delivery notes to ensure the correct material was ordered. Contact the supplier if necessary. Does the construction plan need adjustment?

issues.details: Material is missing: STEEL BEAM D (70845127)
issues.consequence: The system will proceed as usual, skipping the missing material.
issues.suggestedFix: Ensure you have confirmed the supply of this material. Is there an alternative material that could be used instead?

issues.consequence: Construction will proceed but progress will be impacted until the material arrives.
issues.suggestedFix: Check with the logistics provider for updated delivery details. Adjust construction milestones as needed.
